events.message: I received the laptop I ordered yesterday, but its screen has multiple scratches and the keyboard keys are stuck. This product is clearly defective and I am very disappointed.
The reported problem involves physical damage and faulty components of the laptop, categorized under Product Defect.
The case has been assigned to a technical support agent specialized in hardware defects for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop screen and keyboard. I'll be glad to help you resolve this.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and the keyboard defects, as well as your order number for verification?
I have attached several pictures showing the scratches and stuck keys, along with my order number 123456789 for your reference.
Thank you for the details. We can send you a replacement laptop at no additional cost or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement since I still want to use the laptop. Thank you for the quick response and the offered solution.
We have arranged for a replacement laptop to be shipped to your address. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
Checking in to ensure you have received the replacement laptop and that it meets your expectations. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the replacement and have no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation.
